Plot: When the daughter of a psychiatrist is kidnapped, he's horrified to discover that the abductors' demand is that he break through to a post traumatic stress disorder suffering young woman who knows a secret...
Title: Don't Say a Word
Writer: Andrew Klavan (novel), Anthony Peckham (screenplay), Patrick Smith Kelly (screenplay)
Actors: Michael Douglas, Sean Bean, Brittany Murphy, Skye McCole Bartusiak
tomatoConsensus: Don't Say A Word is slick and competently made, but the movie is routine and stretches believability with many eye rolling moments.
